release_note: This is a minor update with no visible changes just bug fixes and performance improvements. If you d like to see more regular updates then why not try out our next generation client Element X.

Element 1.11.8 is now available as a bug fix update with the following changes: Fix Dictation when using the Rich Text Editor. Fix QR Code Scanning when the camera is too close. Disable the Mark As Unread feature which was incompatible with Element Web and Element X. The full history is available at https: github.com element hq element ios releases tag v1.11.8
This new version of Element iOS fixes a couple of issues around translations and accessibility labels
Happy new year everyone today we released a new version of Element which fixes some bugs and improves the overall stability of the application.

Element 1.11.5 is a maintenance update with bug fixes for the following: There was a bug where a notification inviting you to chat would sometimes be silently dropped. Editing a message that ends with an emoji now works as expected. Jitsi calls respond accordingly when removed from a room or ended by the moderator. iOS 15 or later is required to upgrade to this release. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.11.5
In this stability release we fixed a couple of bugs around the rich text editor and login with QR code and we exposed a new well known option for enabling Jitsi for one to one calls

This build makes some minor changes to account and device management when using a homeserver that is configured with native OIDC our shiny new login technology . The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.11.3

In this stability release we fixed a series of bugs and made the app aware of OIDC logins and new account management flows The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.11.1

This version of Element removes some features that were causing issues with encrypted messages: Element no longer appears in the iOS Share sheet. You can still share your photos videos and files within the app. Long pressing on a notification won t show a reply field. Reply by tapping the notification to open the app. Asking Siri to send a message is not possible any more. Siri is available from the keyboard within the app however. On a more exciting note Device Dehydration v2 is now available to homeservers using this feature and bug fixes are included for opening newer rooms versions and signing in with SSO. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.11.0

If you ve been seeing red whilst using Element over the last week or two then this hotfix release is for you! It squashes a bug with some homeservers that could result in all of your messages being displayed as mentions. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.14

This release is a minor update that brings composer suggestions for slash commands as well as a battery of bug fixes and improvements. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.12

We re bouncing with excitement to share the news of Element 1.10.11 s release which includes an update to the Rich Text Editor. Version 2.0 of the Editor features support for Mention Pills so it s now just as easy to tag someone as it is to create a list or add a link. But wait there s more! This release also includes various bug fixes and performance improvements to make your chat experience even better. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.11

Our brand new end to end encryption engine written in Rust has reached maturity and is now enabled for everyone! Your encrypted chats are now faster safer and more reliable. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.10

Have you ever wondered why the Jump To Unread button sometimes gets fixated on jumping back to a really old message that you ve already seen Yeah us too! Today s release fixes this the marker was getting trapped inside of reactions and adds the ability to room whenever you have the power to do so. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.9

This release is a minor update that will let you know if your device needs to be re verified when updating to a more secure end to end encryption engine. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.8

This release is a minor update with a handful of bug fixes throughout the app. Verification: Fix issue where current session cannot be successfully verified Various crashes during syncing The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.7

Great news everyone! Element 1.10.6 is out now with new and improved links for users rooms and messages. These are automatically displayed as nice and tappable interactive pills. But that s not all the update comes with some bug fixes and improvements such as: A shiny new progress bar is shown during startup! The user menu button is much easier to tap. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.6

Begone Element 1.10.3 and make way for Element 1.10.5! Today s update is relatively unremarkable mainly focused around bug fixes and performance improvements to keep your chats ticking along smoothly. But we also managed to sneak in the following new features: Verification: Automatically open the QR reader when needed. Encryption: A chat will now be encrypted when inviting new users via email. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.4 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.5

It s great when one of your friends sends you their location on the map but let s be honest reading a map isn t exactly easy if you don t know where you are! No need to worry any longer in this new update maps now show a nice little button that displays your own position too. But that s not all this release also includes: An updated version of the Rich Text Editor be sure to give it a try in Labs. Bug fixes for voice message recording which can now also be replayed without any issue. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.3

The sun is shining the birds are tweeting and look today we released Element 1.10.2 with a couple of new features that you re surely going to enjoy: Mark as Unread: Finally it s now possible to mark a room as unread so you ll never forget to come back to that conversation you were saving for later but accidentally opened. Poll History: If you ever wanted to see old polls in a room we ve added a list of them which you can view by tapping the room name at the top of the screen. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.1 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.2

Have you ever looked at a conversation where half of your messages are Unable to decrypt errors In this exciting update we bring you the option to try our new end to end encryption engine Beta rewritten completely from scratch in Rust. It will make all your encrypted communications faster safer and more reliable. If you want to try it out head over to the Labs and enable it. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.10.0

Hold onto your hats the time has come for Element 1.9.17 to be released into the world. This version includes new formatting options in the Rich Text Editor Labs : You can now create lists both bullet points and numbers the choice is yours! Additionally support for inserting quotes and better code formatting is available. The Voice Broadcast Labs feature is more reliable with many bug fixes. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.16 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.17

Welcome to 2023 a new year a new you and a new version of Element for iOS! This release includes many small changes and bugfixes the highlights of which are: You can now create links and code blocks with the Rich Text Editor. The final results of a Poll will be shown when it ends so you don t need to scroll back to find them. Both Threads and Voice Broadcasts have been improved and are more reliable. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.15

What s this then The last release of Element in 2022 that s what! And to round out the year we re enabling Threads for everyone! Threads: Enabled by default for everyone. Please let us know if you discover any issues as we get ready to make them permanently enabled. Notifications: The Spaces button now shows a badge to indicate the number of unread conversations in other spaces so you won t miss those important messages or invites anymore. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.14

Another release another round of bugs squashed. Your feedback is invaluable to help us improve the app so please keep it coming! Message composer: Lots of improvements for new rich text editor. We d love for you to enable the labs setting and try it out. Device manager: Improvements in the redesigned device manager screen. We d love for you to enable the labs setting and try it out from Settings Manage sessions. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.13

Another release another round of bugs squashed. Your feedback is invaluable to help us improve the app so please keep it coming! Message composer: Lots of improvements for new rich text editor. We d love for you to enable the labs setting and try it out. Device manager: Improvements in the redesigned device manager screen. We d love for you to enable the labs setting and try it out from Settings Manage sessions. Threads: Improvements about read receipts and notification counts. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.12

This release is a minor update with a handful of bug fixes throughout the app. Message composer: Lots of improvements for new rich text editor. We d love for you to enable the labs setting and try it out. Device manager: Improvements in the redesigned device manager screen. We d love for you to enable the labs setting and try it out from Settings Manage sessions. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.10

Another release another round of bugs squashed. Your feedback is invaluable to help us improve the app so please keep it coming! Message composer: We ve enabled a brand new rich text editor. We d love for you to enable the labs setting and try it out. Device manager: We ve completely redesigned the device manager screen.We d love for you to enable the labs setting and try it out from Settings Manage sessions. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.9

Another release another round of bugs squashed. Your feedback is invaluable to help us improve the app so please keep it coming! Voiceover: Missing labels have been added to the buttons on the All Chats screen. Message formatting: Code blocks show in the correct colour once again. Media playback: A bug where video playback would restart has been fixed. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.8
This update provides important security fixes update now.

This release is a minor update with a handful of bug fixes throughout the app. Various crashes have been fixed that could occur when logging out previewing rooms or displaying keyboard. Some issues have been fixed about the room list and logging in and out after the new App Layout. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.6

1.9.5: This latest update includes a small fix for a display issue with Reactions. 1.9.4: The new App Layout is now enabled by default! The new view is cleaner easier to browse and faster to navigate. All the Element goodness is still available it s moved to better suit your workflow. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.5 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.4 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.3

The new App Layout is now enabled by default! The new view is cleaner easier to browse and faster to navigate. All the Element goodness is still available it s moved to better suit your workflow. We fixed some glitches for the new layout in this release. And as always we fixed some annoying bugs. Enjoy! The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.4 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.3

A brand new layout! The new view is cleaner easier to browse and faster to navigate. All the Element goodness is still available it s moved to better suit your workflow. We d love for you to enable the labs setting and try it out. And as always we fixed some big bugs and some not so big ones. Enjoy! The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.0 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.1 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.9.2

Hot on the heels of 1.8.24 the latest release of Element is now available for the whole world to use. This version is crammed full of bug fixes to make your experience on Matrix much more enjoyable: In app notifications will now be added to Notification Centre instead of silently disappearing into the ether after the banner slides away. It is once again possible to browse a public room directory on another server when your own homeserver doesn t provide its own directory. When sharing your photos from other apps each image is now sent once and only once. Some specific Spaces were causing the app to crash this has been fixed. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.25 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.26 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.27

It s that time again today is the day we release the next version of Element! Version 1.8.24 has plenty of bug fixes along with some wonderful new features: Registration and login screens completely redesigned. Element is now available in more languages than ever before. Want to help contribute translations for your language Then head over to translate.element.io and give us a hand! The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.24

Listen up! Element 1.8.22 has arrived and adds a super new feature for anyone who spends all of their day using the app: In App Notifications. Your notifications will continue to come through when the app is open so you won t miss any of that really important conversation. We ve improved the Offline indicator to be visible from many more screens throughout the app. Calls will now correctly default to using bluetooth devices if connected. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.21 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.22

Are you enjoying Location Sharing but have tired thumbs from tapping every time you need to update your location Then fret no more! Element 1.8.20 features our new Live Location Sharing feature now available in Labs. Live Location Sharing: Now in Labs we ve added the ability to send your location in real time to the people and rooms of your choice! Mark as Read: Quickly mark a single room as read by long pressing it on the home screen. Annoying bugs fixed: It s much easier to tap the names and avatars of room members voice messages now work better with VoiceOver enabled and it is significantly faster to create a new room. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.20

This release is a minor update with a handful of bug fixes throughout the app. You can now see when a message was removed from a room. It is now possible to change your account password without signing out your other devices. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.19

This release is a minor update with some small improvements to Mention Pills and a handful of bug fixes throughout the app. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.17 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.18

Some of you have been waiting for this release for a very long time. So without further ado please put your hands together for Element 1.8.15 with its wonderful improvements to user mentions. Mention Pills: Element finally displays mentions on iOS the same way as it does on Android and the web. Presence: The presence indicators shown on DMs now update immediately when your contacts come online go offline. Requires a supported homeserver . The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.15 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.16

Element 1.8.14 is all about stability and fixing a few issues that slipped through the net in the previous release. Thanks for all of your reports about these they really help us to make the app better than ever! Element now requires iOS 14 or higher to run. Various crashes have been fixed that could occur when previewing rooms joining spaces or searching the app. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.14

Look what s just landed Element 1.8.13 is now available and ready for your enjoyment! If you like to see who s currently online then the Presence updates are just the thing for you: Presence indicators: We ve added new indicators throughout your DMs so you can quickly see if someone is online or away. Depends on support from your homeserver . Bug fixes: Some pesky bugs have been fixed such as the home screen jumping around when you launch the app. This will be our last release to support iOS 12 13. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.13

It s that time again today is the day we release the next version of Element! Version 1.8.12 has plenty of bug fixes along with some wonderful new features: We ve made it possible to share any point on the map and not just your current location. Element is now available in more languages than ever before. Want to help contribute translations for your language Then head over to translate.element.io and give us a hand! You can now preview rooms from the main screen by long pressing them. Tapping the preview opens the room directly. Threads are almost ready for release and we d love for you to enable the labs setting and try them out. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.11 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.12

Element 1.8.10 fixes a crash that would occur when using the built in camera to send photos. Previous changes included in Element 1.8.9: Spaces can now be created and updated on iOS so you can organise your rooms on the go. Ever wanted to reply in a thread without leaving the lock screen Well now you can! Sharing photos and videos from other apps is now 100 more reliable! The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.8 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.9 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.10

Element 1.8.9 is out ready for the whole world to see and boy is this release a doozy! If you like using Spaces on Matrix you re going to love the new features we ve added. Spaces can now be created and updated on iOS so you can organise your rooms on the go. Ever wanted to reply in a thread without leaving the lock screen Well now you can! Sharing photos and videos from other apps is now 100 more reliable! The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.8 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.9

We re really excited to share Element 1.8.7 with you which brings a number of visually pleasing improvements: You can now collapse your invites and other sections useful if you re trying to ignore someone! There are new shiny loading indicators that don t get in your way anymore. No more scary exclamation marks when you re invited to a new room. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.4 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.5 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.6 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.7

Bug fixes and improvements Yes it might be boring but version 1.8.3 contains many small changes that make Element a lot nicer to use. A few of our favourite highlights include: Polls: You can now hide the results until the poll has ended. Account: It is now possible to add your phone number to your account once more. Message Bubbles Labs : We ve been improving the layout based on your feedback. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.2 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.3

Hot on the heels of version 1.7 here comes Element 1.8.1 chock full of new features that quite frankly we re rather excited to use ourselves! Here s a selection of the biggest additions: Threads: Now available in Labs threads help you to cut out the noise in busy rooms. Emoji Reactions: You asked we heard. We ve updated our reactions with all those missing emoji. Landing Screen: We ve given the first screen for new users a fresh coat of paint. Location sharing: Now enabled by default for all users. On top of all of this some of the most annoying bugs have been fixed such as that one where rooms weren t scrolling all the way to the bottom and that other one where the home screen wasn t always sorted correctly. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.0 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.8.1

Do you ever struggle to find your friends Or regularly forget where you were meant to be meeting up Then check out Element 1.7.0 which adds a wonderful new feature just for you! Location sharing: Send your location to a room by tapping the button. Polls are officially out of beta and available for everyone. App launch is now significantly faster. And if that s not enough keep your eyes peeled for the next feature that s currently bubbling away in the background. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.7.0

We re blasting into 2022 with Element 1.6.12 which includes improvements to our Analytics so you can help us understand how you use multiple devices to make your experience better than ever. If you consent we ll generate a random identifier shared by your devices. We don t record or profile any account data. We don t share information with third parties. You can turn this off anytime in settings. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.6.12

Everyone give a warm welcome to Element 1.6.11 with a special preview of our upcoming Polls feature now available as a Beta: You can now see and vote on Polls that have been sent in a room. There is a new labs setting to allow you to create your own Polls. It is possible to copy someone s Matrix ID when displaying their profile. A crash that occurred when double tapping the People tab has been fixed. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.6.11

Element 1.6.10 is ready for your enjoyment! Some of the notable changes include: Forwarding images videos or files to multiple rooms will be much faster. Audio attachments now use the same player as Voice Messages. The 50 room limit has been removed when browsing Spaces. The keyboard now remembers which language to use on a per room basis. A potential battery drain bug is fixed and VoIP calls should be more reliable. The full history is available at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.6.9

It s time to say hello to Element 1.6.8! Sorry for the delay to our usual release schedule as a way of making up this version now includes the following new features: A Show all rooms toggle on the Home space to hide any rooms from other spaces. Username completion when typing in the composer. Message forwarding and the option to share files to multiple rooms. Visual polish has been added to the Settings screen. The usual assortment of improvements and bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.6.8 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.6.6

This is a maintenance release with several improvements and bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.6.5 history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.6.4 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.6.2
This release adds support of Spaces and URLs preview. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.6.1 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.6.0

This release improves the app startup time. It is between 3 and 4 times faster. This release also brings several improvements and bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.5.4 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.5.3

Add support to account notification settings global and keywords on iOS 14 . Fix an issue with voice message rendering. This release brings also several improvements and bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.5.2

The app now supports voice messages. This release brings also several improvements and bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.5.1 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.5.0

People and rooms tabs got an update! They only show joined and invited rooms now. The release also contains several improvements and bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.4.9 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.4.8
This version contains several bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.4.6 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.4.7
This release fixes a major regression where the app remained locked after receiving a notification. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.4.5
This release contains several improvements and bug fixes including a fix for Single Sign On SSO . Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.4.4
This version contains several bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.4.3

This release brings several performance improvements and crash fixes. The application has a new side menu and a new security settings screen. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.4.2

This release brings several performance improvements and crash fixes. Thanks to our community working on translations we have enabled several languages in the app: Esperanto Portuguese Brazil Kabyle Norwegian Swedish Japanese and Welsh. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.4.1 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.4.0.

This version contains several improvements and bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.3.7 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.3.8 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.3.9.
This release receives another update on voice and video calls. It also contains several improvements and bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.3.6.
This version contains several improvements and bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.3.5.

This version brings several changes to the room screen: new design for the text composer new action icons removal of the activity section at the bottom. It contains several improvements on notifications. In particular a fix for a bug that prevented the application from decrypting certain messages. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.3.4 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.3.3 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.3.1 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.3.0.
This version contains several improvements and bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.2.7.
This version brings a new display for the progress of sending a message or media. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.2.6.
This version contains several improvements and bug fixes. Full history at:

This release receives an update on voice and video calls. It implements the latest version of the Voice Over IP feature in the Matrix protocol. Improvements for ends users are a better reliability Picture in Picture PiP and call hold. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.2.0 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.2.1.
This version contains several improvements and bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.1.7.

This release brings social login support if your Matrix homeserver supports it. It also provides a lot of minor UI improvements and bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.1.6 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.1.5 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.1.4.

This release contains several bug fixes including improvements for push notifications and the time to display notification content in the app. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.1.3 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.1.2.

This release contains several major bug fixes including end to end encrytion bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.1.1 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.1.0.

This release provides a new room details screen wording improvements for DM chats Estonian language support and a lot of minor UI improvements and lots of bug fixes. Full history at https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.0.16 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.0.15 https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.0.14 and https: github.com vector im element ios releases tag v1.0.13
This release fixes a background crash and some other bugs. New features are: New contextual room creation buttons A new room creation screen Creation events are now collapsed by default
This release comes with a new feature: the app protection by PIN code Touch ID or Face ID and the return of the native incoming call screen. It also contains many bug fixes.
This release contains several bug fixes.
Riot.im is now Element! Improved end to end encryption and cross signing to verify those in the conversation. Much lighter on battery usage. Full support for iOS 13 including push notifications.
This release contains improvements and bug fixes for cross signing.
This release contains improvements and bug fixes for cross signing.
This release brings cross signing support device and user verification by QR code encryption by default in private rooms new iconography and many improvements in many areas.
This release fixes: automatic deactivation of push notifications issues when joining some public rooms. It also provides a better support for complex SSO authentication flows.
This release contains a bug fix for device verification.

This release includes bug fixes and improvements like: Ask permission before opening a widget and the integration manager. Display room name user name and user avatar in the Jitsi conference screen. Support Welsh and Italian languages.
Riot iOS 0.10.2 includes a bug fix that prevented the app from launching integrations.
This is a maintenance release with minor improvements and plenty of bug fixes including the annoying bug with VoIP calls.

This release improves your privacy. The identity server the centralised server used to discover who from your contacts is using Matrix can be now changed in the app settings at any time. For even more privacy data ie emails and phone numbers sent to your identity server are now hashed.
This release fixes some issues with VoiceOver.
Fix Single Sign On authentication with some OAuth providers.
This is a quick update to support Riot configuration link to customise user s homeserver on the authentication screen.
New features are: New native camera screen to take photo or video within the app Emoji picker for reactions Reaction history screen Support of soft logout

This release brings message editing and reactions to Riot. These actions are available from a new context menu when selecting a message. You can finally! upload files to a room. We have also fixed a lot of issues. Main ones are: notifications that disabled themselves joining an upgraded room was impossible through federation registration with an email was broken
We re always making changes and improvements to Riot.im. The complete changelog can be found at https: github.com vector im riot ios releases latest.
We re always making changes and improvements to Riot.im. The complete changelog can be found at https: github.com vector im riot ios releases latest.
We re always making changes and improvements to Riot.im. The complete changelog can be found at https: github.com vector im riot ios releases latest.
We re always making changes and improvements to Riot.im. The complete changelog can be found at https: github.com vector im riot ios releases latest.
New icon new colors. You can now back up your encryption keys to the server.
Several bugs have been fixed like: photos sending whith the share extension the random bug with the photos order in the timeline etc
This new version supports the consent of matrix servers terms of service including GDPR in the registration flow. It also contains fixes for the Empty room bug the registration issue on iOS 10 etc.
This is a maintenance release with a lot of bug fixes
Lazy loading of room members is now enabled by default. This release adds Spanish translation and contains bug fixes.

This release manages homeserver resource limit. It also contains regression and bug fixes. Lazy loading of room members is available for beta testing. It can be enabled from the LABS section of the app settings.
You can now send a reply to a message. Albanian and Traditional Chinese have been added. This release contains bug and crash fixes and a significant improvement on the startup time.

When a message is unable to decrypt you can now re request keys from your other devices. This release contains bug and crash fixes but it is also the starting point of a series of performance improvements.
A new Account deactivation button appeared in the settings. Icelandic is now available in the app. Also you can now send stickers!
This quick release makes the app ready for GDPR.
Riot can now display stickers. This release contains minor improvements and bug fixes.
This release introduces the quick reply to notifications Bulgarian Catalan and a lot of bug fixes.
Fix the empty communities screen issue

This release includes the first support for Communities! If you re using Riot as a team Communities let you group all the users and rooms in your team into one place giving your team a place in Matrix to call your own. Give them a try on the new Communities tab!
A quick bug fix version to fix a problem where sometimes Riot wouldn t display notifications for messages.

This release fixes one major issue with push notifications and one minor issue for the display of some Matrix Apps like TradingView . Call invite lifetime has been increased from 30s to 60s so that you have more time to answer a call.
Just a minor update to fix some devices which started showing key share requests from a null device.

Another exciting update: Riot now supports key sharing! What s that I hear you ask Well it means that now if you use end to end encryption Riot will share the keys for encrypted messages between all of your devices. That means if you re able to decrypt history on one device you should now be able to see it on all your devices. Don t worry Riot is always very careful with your keys and will only ever send them to devices you ve verified so if you haven t yet verified your other devices you ll see a prompt letting you do so whenever a device asks for keys. There s also a collection of other bug fixes naturally such as making the keyboard dark in the dark theme and fixing attachments from iCloud.

Over the summer we ve been very lucky to have two students from Google s Summer of Code programme making Riot even better. Excitingly this release contains all their improvements which include: Calls now use the proper incoming call screen even if your phone is locked You can now share photos videos and other with Riot straight from other apps with the share sheet Talk to Riot with Siri! You can tell Siri to place calls and send messages. Contents of encrypted messages can now optionally be shown in notifications And of course our regular team has been busy fixing bugs.

We update the app regularly so we... nah just kidding we went landed all new video conferencing support. How s that Voice and video conferencing is now powered by Jitsi bringing more features better reliability and better quality. You can still join old style conferences but heads up that anyone who hasn t updated won t be able to join conferences started from the new version. There s also an all new incoming call screen and support for a helpful little guy we call Riot bot. Plus translations into Basque and Simplified Chinese. And of course it supports iOS 11.

By popular demand Riot now has a dark theme! Flip it on in settings to make the display easier on the eyes at night time for dark places or just for extra stealth. Also it ll save some battery power if you happen to have a phone with the appropriate type of screen... We also fixed a crash that happened the first time you try to send a photo.

Translations! Thanks to lots of people in our awesome community Riot can now speak Dutch German and French! Oh but there s more. Riot now supports audio attachments and supports the user search API which makes it much easier to find who you want to talk to in other words you don t have to remember their username . Oh and now room joins and leaves will be collapsed together unless you tap on them to expand them. Good for people who enter a room forget what they came in for and then leave again. Hey it happens with age. Also messages with just emoji are bigger because what s better than a smiley poo A massive smiley poo that s what.

Riot s had a makeover! The new home screen shows you more of your conversations at a glance so you can pick up right where you left off. Want to get more specific See your favourites in their own tab your direct chats and contacts in another and your group chats in the rooms tab. As if that wasn t enough for one release you can also see exactly where you read up to last time in a room on any of your devices. Plus of course lots more little features and bug fixes.

Riot now supports registering your phone number with your account so now you can find contacts on Riot from your phone book as well as your email address book! We ve also made a whole load of improvements to end to end encryption to make it more reliable and simpler to use including warning you if sending an encrypted message would mean sending it to devices you ve never seen before.

Import and export your end to end encryption keys Massively improve disk usage. Now Riot should take up a lot less space on your phone. And of course we fixed a load of bugs including one where it would get stuck at the loading screen sometimes. Also one where messages appeared to take much longer to send than they actually did.
Lots of fixes for end to end encryption and improvements to looking up Matrix contacts from your address book in preparation for something new...

In this version we re enabling cross platform end to end encryption functionality plus a whole lot of tweaks and improvements. Looking for a file you were sent There s now a files tab in the search screen so it s much simpler to find. If you ve been missing the direct chat labels from the web version those have now come to the app. Plus of course lost of bug fixes like accepting auto completions when you hit send. As always if you have any problems using the app come and talk to us in riot:matrix.org !

Vector is now Riot! Did we mention that Probably. Did we mention Vector now supports voice and video calling too! And now sending video messages! In this particular release we just fixed a bug where the app would crash on some room links. Oops. But VoIP calling!

Did you miss the news Vector is now Riot! As well as a new name and a new look Riot now supports voice and video calling! Just in case that wasn t enough in this release we ve added video sending! Just hold down the shutter button in the camera to record a video. A couple of bugs also snuck in while the app was having its makeover in particular loading spinners that never stopped on the login and registration screens. That s fixed now.

Vector is now Riot! Welcome to the future of real time collaboration. There s much more than just a new name and a new look though Riot now has voice and video calling! What s more you can join a voice or video conference: set up a conference in any room and anyone in that room can join the call right from the app. Text communication has got better too: Riot now supports rich text messages making your typing more expressive. Rooms can now be set up so that you can see the messages in them without even having to join: perfect for checking out a room before jumping in! And of course bug fixes too numerous to mention here.
Lots and lots of bug fixes and polish see https: github.com vector im vector ios blob master CHANGES.rst changes in vector ios in 0110 2016 06 04 for the full details.
